extDescription.message: ScratchTools is fully customizable with tons of features, all for making the Scratch website better and easier to use!

newest_update_message.message: This new version includes a few cool new features, as well as multiple bug fixes! One feature, Unlisted Projects, allows you to create special links for your unshared projects that allow other people to view them!

welcome_to_settings.message: Welcome to your settings! You can find all features here!

disabled_explanation.message: This feature has been disabled remotely by ScratchTools. You can still enable/disable it, but, for safety reasons, it won't work for now.

load_more_forum_posts_description.message: Load more posts in the forum without having to switch pages.

unlisted_projects_description.message: Allows you to generate share links for unshared projects in the editor.

scroll_project_titles_description.message: Allows you to scroll and view the entire title of projects that you don't own.

search_context_menus_description.message: Easily search context menus to select an option efficiently. You can also press enter to select the top option.

hover_user_cards_description.message: Hover over any username on the website to display the profile picture, username and follower count.

exact_join_date_description.message: Displays the exact time that a user joined, shown on their profile.

start_stop_hotkeys_title.message: Shortcuts for Starting and Stopping Projects

start_stop_hotkeys_description.message: To start and stop a project you can use Control+G or Command+G (for Mac users).

upload_img_directly_title.message: Direct image uploads in the forums

upload_img_directly_description.message: Allows you to easily upload images to the Scratch forums for posts and signatures without having to use third party image uploading services.

leave_studio_description.message: Adds a button to the curators page of any studios you curate or manage that allows you to easily leave the studio. A confirmation shows first.

user_stats_description.message: Replaces the 'What I've been doing' section on a profile page with the user's statistics.

frontpage_curator_description.message: Makes the name of the Frontpage Curator to a clickable link to his profile.

minimized_remix_credits_description.message: The remix credit boxes for projects take space from the project Instructions, so this makes the box smaller.

follows_you_description.message: If a user is following you, it will show next to their username when you visit their profile.

custom_studio_description.message: On the homepage of the Scratch website, the newest projects from the studio of your choice are displayed above the Featured Projects.

highlight_unanswered_description.message: Adds a blue highlight to topics in the forums that have no replies.

hide_project_tags_description.message: Hides all linked tags in the Instructions/Notes and Credits of projects.

hide_block_category_names_description.message: Changes the block categories in the editor to only show the colors of the categories.

search_assets_description.message: Easily search through costume and sound assets in the editor.

block_count_in_mystuff_description.message: Displays the block count for projects on the My Stuff page.

block_studios_description.message: Disable studio activity messages from specific studios.

pause_audio_description.message: Allows you to pause and resume audio in the sound editor of Scratch projects.

display_message_count_in_icon_descriptio.message: Displays your current message count in the extension icon for ScratchTools.

colored_context_menus_description.message: Like in Scratch 2.0, colors the context menus based on the color of the block they're for.

left_side_stage_description.message: Like in Scratch 2.0, moves the stage to the left side of the editor, rather than keeping it on the right.

move_project_title_input_description.message: Like in Scratch 2.0, moves the project title input box above the stage, rather than in the navbar. This only applies to the editor.

hide_disabled_menu_options_description.message: Context menu options in the editor show even if they are disabled and unable to be used, so this feature will hide them if they are.

dumpster_fire_description.message: The Scratch homepage is a liar with their "Featured Projects" section. This changes the name to the proper form, which is "Dumpster Fire".

follower_count_description.message: Displays the follower count of the project creator on their projects.

hide_studio_borders_description.message: Removes the odd frames from around studio images on 2.0 pages.

hide_textarea_labels_title.message: Hide Project Instructions and Notes and Credits Labels

hide_textarea_labels_description.message: The instructions and notes and credits labels take up quite a bit of space where there could be usual information. This removes them.

default_to_trending_description.message: Currently, when you search projects on the Scratch website, you automatically search with the popular filter, instead of trending.

infinite_backpack_scrolling_description.message: Scroll through the backpack until you reach the very end (does take some time to load, but loads automatically).

preview_textboxes_description.message: Preview your profile About Me and What I'm Working On, and your projects' Instructions and Notes and Credits, so that you can see what it will look like to other users!

hide_studio_messages_description.message: Hide the studio activity messages from the messages page- they pile up quickly and can get annoying.

default_to_local_description.message: When creating a variable, sets the default to For This Sprite Only, rather than For All Sprites.

special_editor_fonts_description.message: Adds more fonts to choose from in the paint editor. They look nicer and are more modern.

opacity_setter_description.message: Adds an input to the costume editor where you can set the opacity of elements.

get_project_tags_description.message: Lists all of the tags used in the project description right below the project notes and credits.

link_to_propose_description.message: Links the Featured Projects box on the homepage to the Propose Projects to Be Featured studio.

add_last_option_list_description.message: Right click a 'get item [number] of [list]' to set it to select the very last item in the selected list.

cloud_scratchers_description.message: On project pages, displays all of the Scratchers currently in that multiplayer game.

editor_in_two_description.message: Replaces the default 3.0 online project editor with the 2.0 editor. It's nostalgic, really.

comment_on_closed_profile_title.message: Comment On Profile With Comments Closed

comment_on_closed_profile_description.message: If your profile comments are closed, you can now comment on your own profile anyways! Only you can comment on the profile.

hide_advertisements_description.message: Hides advertisements in the comments of profiles, projects, and studios. They can take up a lot of space in the comments.

turbowarp_button_in_editor_description.message: Adds a button to the editor so that you can instantly open the current project in TurboWarp.

sprite_clones_description.message: Displays the clone count for each individual sprite.

block_log_description.message: Logs and displays all undo information for the block editor when you press ctrl+shift+l.

scrollable_list_items_description.message: List items that have a value longer than the width of the list itself will get cut off. Now, you can scroll left and right through the list item.

admin_notifications_title.message: Message Indicator Red for Admin Messages

admin_notifications_description.message: If you have an admin notification from the Scratch Team, the message indicator in the navigation bar will display red instead of orange.

rickroll_description.message: You won't know until you find out... there's a button on project pages.

custom_fonts_description.message: On the Scratch website, you can set the font to whatever font you want, as long as it is on the Google Fonts website. This is case-sensitive.

project_timer_description.message: Displays the amount of time (in seconds) that the project has been running for.

colored_comments_description.message: Colors comments in the editor based on the color of their parent block.

recently_viewed_projects_description.message: Adds a tab to the My Stuff page where you can see a list of the projects that you have recently viewed.

anti_generic_description.message: On the explore and trending pages, this beta feature automatically hides repetitive projects, along with projects that it expects are generic. This includes projects with a lot of tags, common names, and project duplicates.

collapse_blocks_description.message: Right-click block menus in the editor include a button that will let you collapse the selected block.

set_featured_project_description.message: On any project page, you can easily set your profile's featured project with the click of a button- even unshared projects.

scratchformat_description.message: Format your comments with bold, italic, and more! The comments will look amazing to everyone using ScratchTools.

expand_editor_description.message: Use the ctrl+e to easily switch between the default block editor view and one that hides the stage to expand editor itself!

list_sprites_description.message: Replaces the sprite grid in the editor with a list that includes the block count and position of the sprite.

check_if_trending_description.message: If a project you're viewing is on the trending page, the place on the trending page will be shown next to the share date on the project page.

link_forum_activity_description.message: In the forums' last post section, makes the usernames link to the user's profile.

remove_topic_and_post_description.message: Hides the forum homepage topic and post boxes.

forum_homepage_emojis_description.message: Adds colorful emojis on the forum homepage categories based on their topic.

remove_collapse_buttons_description.message: Hides the collapse buttons on the forum main page.

pin_projects_description.message: Pin one of your projects to the top of your My Stuff page with the click of a button! You can unpin your pinned project or switch out your pinned project for another one as well!

last_key_pressed_description.message: On any project page and in the editor, you can view the last key that you have pressed while on that project, according to the project itself! This is good for games such as platformers.

hide_signatures_description.message: Hides all forum signatures and signature dividers.

twemoji_in_forums_description.message: Replaces the current low resolution forum emojis with high quality Twemojis.

go_to_parent_description.message: In the editor for any project that is a remix, you can click a button to go to the editor in the parent project.

most_popular_project_description.message: Displays the most popular project (by views) of the user on profile pages. You can click on the project to view it.

block_messages_description.message: Hide messages on the messages page that are created by users that you have blocked (includes a block page).

editor_dark_mode_description.message: Is light to bright in the editor? Now you can enjoy darkness in the editor, with a beautiful dark theme.

hide_studio_group_icon_description.message: Hides the studio group icon, and only shows the studio thumbnail.

two_colors_description.message: Replaces the colors of the blocks in the editor with the blocks from the 2.0 version of the code editor.

colored_messages_description.message: Colors your messages based on the type of message, such as loves, favorites, and studio invites!

full_title_description.message: On profile pages, hover over any project title to show the full title.

april_fools_description.message: Brings back the special modes from the 2022 April Fools Day!

project_links_description.message: In profile and project comments, project links in comments are replaced with their titles.

fixed_box_description.message: Makes all sides of boxes on the pages rounded, rather than just the tops.

user_bio_description.message: In profile comments, hover over any username to display the user's bio.

nfe_project_checker_description.message: On project pages, displays whether the project is Safe, Unreviewed, or NSFE (Not Safe for Everyone).

advanced_search_description.message: Replaces the basic search that Scratch uses with a much better and smarter search.

clone_counter_description.message: Displays a bar with the percentage of allowed clones active in the project.

sprite_data_description.message: In the Code, Costumes, and Sounds tab for each sprite, the number of blocks, costumes, and sounds will be displayed for the current sprite.

box_shadows_description.message: Adds shadows on all content boxes. When hovering one, the shadow will darken.

aviate_description.message: Displays Aviate statuses on profile pages. You can set your status at aviateapp.eu.org.

idea_generator_description.message: On the Scratch Ideas page, there will be a section where you can generate project ideas if you need some!

hide_stickies_description.message: Hides the basic stickies from the top of each forum topic.

more_tutorials_description.message: Adds extra tutorials to the ideas page.

nfe_search_description.message: Use a button to search all projects, including NFE ones.

statistics_description.message: Adds a statistics button on the my stuff page that leads to the user's ScratchStats profile.

open_in_new_tab_description.message: Automatically opens links on project pages in a new tab.

plain_background_description.message: Removes the dots from the background of the code editor.

unbold_site_text_description.message: Makes it so that all text across Scratch is unbolded, and just normal text!

compact_navbar_description.message: Makes more room on the navigation bar near where your profile dropdown is.

delete_all_description.message: Adds an option in the right-click context menu for sprites. It will delete all sprites (after confirmation to make sure it isn't an accident).

round_profile_pictures_description.message: All profile pictures on the Scratch website will be rounded.

sidebar_description.message: Adds a sidebar to the Scratch website, rather than just the normal navigation bar at the top of the screen.

ocular_link_description.message: Adds a link to any user's Ocular page right below their username on a post.

forum_scratch_team_description.message: Next to the username of any Scratch Team member in the forums, an asterisk (*) is placed at the end of their username.

message_count_description.message: On profiles, displays the user's message count next to their country.

remove_editor_icons_description.message: Removes the icons from the tabs in the editor.

sprite_watermark_description.message: Removes the sprite watermark that shows in the editor.

compact_editor_description.message: Makes sprite and backdrop information more compact.

right_side_flag_description.message: Moves the green flag and the red stop sign to the right side of the stage.

my_recent_projects_title.message: Replace Scratch News with Recent Projects

my_recent_projects_description.message: Replaces the Scratch News section on the homepage with your recently shared projects.

hide_scratch_news_description.message: Hides the Scratch News section on the homepage of the Scratch website. This feature will interfere with the Replace Scratch News with Recent Projects feature if enabled.

focus_mode_description.message: Removes the comments, studio and remix column, header, and footer on project pages when the button is clicked.
